1.description: Stage 1: Search the source tubes. Search the order. Assign a batch to the source tubes.

steps.description: Find the tubes by barcodes
Get the search results
Find the order by tube uuid and role
Get the search results
Create a new batch
Assign the batch uuid to the tubes in the order item

2.description: Stage 2: Build and start the order

steps.description: Change the status of the order to pending
Change the status of the order to in_progress

3.description: Stage 3: Create binding_spin_columns_dna spin columns. Create by_product_tube tubes. Transfers from tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_dna and by_product_tube tubes.

steps.description: Create new spin columns
Create new tubes
Add the new spin columns and new tubes in the order and start each of them
Transfers from tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_dna spins and into by_product_tube tubes.
Change the status of the binding_spin_column_dna to done. Change the status of the by_product_tube to done. Change the status of the tube_to_be_extracted to unused

4.description: Stage 4: Use the binding_spin_column_dna spins in a new role elution_spin_column_dna. Then transfer the content of the spin columns to new extracted_tube tubes.

steps.description: Add the binding_spin_column_dna under the role elution_spin_column_dna and start them.
Change the status of elution_spin_column_dna to done. Change the status of binding_spin_column_dna to unused
Create new tubes
Add the extracted_dna_tube in the order and start them
Transfer elution_spin_column_dna into extracted_tube
Change the status of extracted_tube tubes to done. Change the status of elution_spin_column_dna to unused

5.description: Stage 5: Create new tube_to_be_extracted tube. Transfer from by_product_tube into tube_to_be_extracted.

steps.description: Create new tubes
Add tube_to_be_extracted tubes in the order and start them.
Transfer from by_product_tube tubes into tube_to_be_extracted tubes
Change the status of by_product_tube to done. Change the status of tube_to_be_extracted to done

6.description: Stage 6: Create binding_spin_column_rna spins. Create by_product_tube tubes. Transfer tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_rna and into by_product_tube.

steps.description: Create new spin columns
Create new tubes
Add the new spin columns and new tubes in the order and start each of them
Transfers from tube_to_be_extracted into binding_spin_column_rna spins and into by_product_tube tubes.
Change the status of binding_spin_column_rna to done. Change the status of by_product_tube to done. Change the status of tube_to_be_extracted to unused

7.description: Stage 7: Use the binding_spin_column_rna spins in a new role elution_spin_column_rna. Then transfer the content of the spin columns to new extracted_tube tubes.

steps.description: Add the binding_spin_column_rna under the role elution_spin_column_rna and start them.
Change the status of elution_spin_column_rna to done. Change the status of binding_spin_column_rna to unused
Create new tubes
Add the extracted_rna_tube in the order and start them
Transfer elution_spin_column_rna into extracted_tube
Change the status of extracted_tube tubes to done. Change the status of elution_spin_column_rna to unused

8.description: Stage 8: Change the status of the order to completed.

9.description: Stage 9: RNA post extraction tube racking. Create new tubes. Add them in the order. Transfer RNA extracted tubes into 2D tubes. Then rack the 2D tubes in a tube rack.

steps.description: Create new tubes
Add the 2d tubes in the order and start them
Transfer extracted tubes into 2D tubes
Change the status of extracted_tube tubes to unused. Change the status of 2d tubes to complete
Create a new tube rack
Add the tube rack in the order and start it
Change the type of the rube rack to complete

10.description: Stage 10: DNA post extraction tube racking. Create new tubes. Add them in the order. Transfer DNA extracted tubes into 2D tubes. Then rack the 2D tubes in a tube rack.

steps.description: Create new tubes
Add the 2d tubes in the order and start them
Transfer extracted tubes into 2D tubes
Change the status of extracted_tube tubes to unused. Change the status of 2d tubes to complete
Create a new tube rack
Add the tube rack in the order and start it
Change the type of the rube rack to complete
